overview: A high school girl and a male office worker meet to trade some second-hand boxing gloves. When the man finds the young girl coming out to buy the gloves, he becomes cocky and tries to teach her a lesson. She doesnâ€™t like his attitude, but she accepts his impromptu sparring request in order to sell the gloves. The sparring starts as a joke, but it becomes more intense. This film tells explores gender discrimination and prejudice in a comical way.
title: Raging Nego
